#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{ int tc;
  scanf("%d",&tc);
  while(tc--)
   { int n,d;
     scanf("%d",&n);
     scanf("%d",&d);
     int a[n];
     int i,sum=0,count=0;
     for(i=0;i<n;i++)
       { scanf("%d",&a[i]);
         sum=sum+a[i];
       }
     int original=d-sum;
     if(original>=(10*(n-1)))
       printf("%d\n",original/5);
     else
       printf("-1\n");
  }
 return 0;
}
